text: niṅṅaḷkk putumānsaṁ eṭutt tinnuvānuṁ niṅṅaḷkk aṇiyānuḷḷa ābharaṇaṅṅaḷ puṟatteṭukkuvānuṁ pākattil kaṭaline vidhēyamākkiyavanuṁ avan tanne. kappalukaḷ atilūṭe veḷḷaṁ piḷarnn māṟṟikkeāṇṭ ōṭunnatuṁ ninakk kāṇāṁ. avanṟe anugrahattil ninn niṅṅaḷ tēṭuvānuṁ niṅṅaḷ nandikāṇikkuvānuṁ vēṇṭiyāṇ‌. (avanat niṅṅaḷkk vidhēyamākkittannat‌)
